00043 bool GetNextRequest(MSHR_H mshrHandler[], Request *req, unsigned int *index)
00044 {
00045     static int lastThreadIndex = NO_OF_THREADS -1;
00046     Time time[NO_OF_THREADS];   
00047     bool temp = false;  
00048     bool mshrFilled[NO_OF_THREADS];
00049     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)
00050     {
00051         mshrFilled[i] = true;
00052         time[i] = -1;
00053         if (!mshrHandler[i].mshr.empty())
00054         {       
00055             if ( mshrHandler[i].lastScheduledIndex < mshrHandler[i].mshr.size() )
00056             {
00057                 time[i] = mshrHandler[i].mshr[mshrHandler[i].lastScheduledIndex].arrivalTime;
00058                 temp = true;
00059                 mshrFilled[i] = false;
00060                 break;
00061             }                           
00062         }
00063         if (!mshrHandler[i].writeQueue.empty())
00064         {       
00065             time[i] = mshrHandler[i].writeQueue[0].arrivalTime;
00066             temp = true;
00067             break;
00068         }               
00069     }
00070 //    cout << Simulator::Now() << ":  " << temp << endl;        
00071     if (!temp)
00072         return temp;    
00073     unsigned int minTime = -1;    
00074     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)
00075     {
00076         unsigned int rr = (i+lastThreadIndex+1)%NO_OF_THREADS;
00077 
00078         if (!mshrHandler[rr].writeQueue.empty())
00079         {       
00080             vector<Request>::iterator bufferIndex = mshrHandler[rr].writeQueue.begin(); 
00081             *req = mshrHandler[rr].writeQueue[0];
00082             mshrHandler[rr].writeQueue.erase(bufferIndex);
00083             lastThreadIndex = rr;       
00084             return true;
00085         }
00086 //      cout << dec << time[i] << " ";  
00087         else if (time[rr] < minTime && !mshrFilled[rr])
00088         {         
00089             minTime = time[rr];
00090             *index = rr;
00091             lastThreadIndex = *index;                   
00092             *req = mshrHandler[rr].mshr[mshrHandler[rr].lastScheduledIndex];
00093             temp = true;                        
00094         }
00095     }
00096     mshrHandler[*index].lastScheduledIndex++;                           
00097     return temp;                        
00098 }
